input:
Galatasaray 0 - 2 Atl.

First Half:

10:44 Event: Ball out of play
10:59 Caption: What a goal-scoring opportunity! Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray) makes a good run into the box to meet a cross and fires the ball in on goal, but the shot is amazingly blocked by a defender. The linesman makes the right call and Galatasaray will have a corner.
11:10 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
11:31 Caption: A dangerous looking corner kick from Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) is cleared to safety by the defence.
11:33 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
11:46 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
12:03 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Galatasaray) commits a rough challenge and Szymon Marciniak blows his whistle for an infringement.
12:10 Event: Ball out of play
12:20 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
14:00 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
14:16 Caption: Luciano Vietto (Atl. Madrid) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the right post. Fernando Muslera pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.
15:31 Event: Ball out of play
15:45 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
15:51 Caption: Hakan Balta (Galatasaray) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!
16:10 Event: Ball out of play
16:19 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
17:13 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
17:14 Event: Goal by Atl.
17:53 Caption: Juanfran passes to Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid), who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes into the bottom right corner. Fabulous goal! The score is 0:1.
18:16 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
18:33 Event: Ball out of play
18:44 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
19:54 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
20:09 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
20:11 Caption: Szymon Marciniak blows the whistle, Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) is penalised for a foul.
20:30 Event: Shots off target by Atl.
20:31 Event: Ball out of play
20:48 Caption: Saul (Atl. Madrid) latches on to a precise pass on the edge of the box, but miskicks his shot and the ball goes high over the bar. Poor effort!
20:56 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
21:05 Event: Ball out of play
21:11 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
21:36 Event: Foul by Atl.
21:56 Caption: Szymon Marciniak interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Guilherme Siqueira (Atl. Madrid). Galatasaray have a free kick.
22:10 Event: Direct free-kick by Galatasaray
22:13 Event: Ball out of play
22:31 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) takes a direct free kick.
22:34 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
22:37 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
23:12 Event: Ball out of play
23:21 Caption: Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) darts to the edge of the box to meet the ball from the free kick and sends a header towards the middle of the target. One of the defending players gets in its way and blocks it. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Galatasaray will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
23:44 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) takes the corner, but it's intercepted by the defender.
23:45 Caption: Saul (Atl. Madrid) gets on the end of a pass on the edge of the box but his shot is blocked. Atl. Madrid have been awarded a corner kick.
23:46 Caption: The resulting corner from Koke (Atl. Madrid) is cleared by the defence.
23:54 Event: Corner by Atl.
24:04 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
24:04 Event: Goal by Atl.
24:39 Caption: GOAL! Diego Godin meets a cross inside the box and heads the ball across the goal, where Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) lurks and pokes it into the back of the net. 0:2.
25:08 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
26:03 Event: Ball out of play
26:08 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
26:19 Event: Ball out of play
26:26 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
26:31 Event: Ball out of play
26:41 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray

27:10 Event: Clearance by Atl.
28:07 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
28:09 Event: Ball out of play
28:29 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
28:34 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) gets into a good scoring position. He creates some space for himself and tries his luck from distance. His decent effort towards the left post is, however, superbly saved by Jan Oblak! The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray have been awarded a corner kick.
29:06 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) takes the corner which is cleared by the opposition's defence.
29:56 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
30:16 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
30:18 Caption: Szymon Marciniak blows his whistle and it's Lukas Podolski (Galatasaray) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.
31:05 Caption: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) comes onto the pitch so that Emre Colak can be given a rest.
31:18 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
31:21 Event: Ball out of play
31:37 Event: Substitution by Galatasaray
31:50 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
31:55 Event: Ball out of play
32:12 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
32:46 Event: Ball out of play
32:54 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
33:34 Event: Ball out of play
33:41 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
34:12 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
34:27 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
34:33 Caption: Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray) was too forceful with his tackle and Szymon Marciniak interrupted the game to signal a free kick.
34:51 Event: Ball out of play
35:16 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
36:27 Event: Ball out of play
36:41 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
37:13 Caption: Great teamplay by Atl. Madrid as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.
37:45 Event: Ball out of play
38:05 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
38:34 Event: Ball out of play
38:42 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
38:57 Caption: Guilherme Siqueira (Atl. Madrid) is picked out by one of his teammates with a great cross, but his poor control allows the defence to clear and avert the threat. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw-in for Atl. Madrid.
39:20 Event: Ball out of play
39:49 Caption: Luciano Vietto (Atl. Madrid) meets a cross inside the box, but his header is blocked by an opposing player. Atl. Madrid earn a corner.
39:54 Event: Corner by Atl.
40:06 Caption: Koke (Atl. Madrid) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.
40:43 Caption: Jose Maria Gimenez (Atl. Madrid) jumps for a header from the resulting corner kick and sends the ball in on goal, but the goalkeeper makes a very good save.
41:04 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
41:05 Event: Ball out of play
41:29 Event: Clearance by Atl.
41:34 Caption: Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) missed a great opportunity! He finds himself some space near the penalty spot and plants a header goalwards which lacks both power and accuracy. The ball goes well wide of the right post!
42:06 Event: Shots off target by Atl.
42:07 Event: Ball out of play
42:34 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
42:47 Event: Ball out of play
43:04 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
43:07 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
43:08 Event: Ball out of play
43:26 Caption: Wow, what an escape. Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) has an effort from inside the box but it's brilliantly blocked. Good work from Galatasaray as they win a corner.
43:32 Event: Clearance by Atl.
43:44 Event: Ball out of play
43:51 Caption: The referee awards a corner and Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) goes over to take it.
44:05 Caption: Jason Denayer (Galatasaray) reacts well and displays good awareness inside the box to get on the end of the resulting corner kick. He fails to direct the ball into the net as it flies narrowly wide of the right post.
44:28 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
46:10 Caption: A cross into the box finds the head of Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray) who steers it goalwards, but Jan Oblak manages to pull off a decent save to thwart him.
46:15 Caption: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Szymon Marciniak has ended it.
46:59 Caption: There has been no time for the supporters to get bored during an eventful opening 45 minutes. Both teams provided some breathtaking moments. The visitors were more active and dominated the home side in the first half, who weren't able to keep up. Both sides are using combination football to try and gain the upper hand.

Second Half:
00:00 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
00:00 Caption: Fourth official shows 1 min. of added time.
00:01 Caption: Szymon Marciniak blows his whistle and the second half starts.
00:17 Event: Foul by Atl.
00:22 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
00:22 Caption: Hamza Hamzaoglu has made a change at the break. Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) has come on in place of Sabri Sarioglu.
00:51 Event: Ball out of play
00:57 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
01:16 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
01:27 Caption: Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Szymon Marciniak blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion.
01:31 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
01:54 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
02:31 Caption: Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) receives a fine low pass and attempts to send the ball past the goalkeeper, but his shot goes wide of the goal.
02:56 Event: Ball out of play
03:13 Event: Clearance by Atl.
03:18 Event: Foul by Galatasaray

03:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
03:47 Event: Foul by Galatasaray

04:49 Event: Direct free-kick by Atl.
05:08 Event: Foul by Atl.
05:15 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
05:35 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
05:42 Caption: Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) dribbles into space and finds himself in a shooting position, but his shot from the edge of the box is bravely blocked.
05:45 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
06:10 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Galatasaray) receives a precise pass on the edge of the box and shoots. His poorly placed shot flies well wide of the left post.
06:36 Caption: The game is interrupted now, Diego Godin (Atl. Madrid) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
07:08 Event: Clearance by Atl.
07:32 Caption: Diego Godin (Atl. Madrid) seems to have picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue playing.
07:42 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
07:43 Event: Ball out of play

08:22 Event: Ball out of play

09:20 Event: Foul by Atl.
09:28 Caption: It looks like Saul Niguez (Atl. Madrid) saw red with that tackle. Szymon Marciniak won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul. Galatasaray win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
10:00 Event: Direct free-kick by Galatasaray
10:00 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
10:01 Event: Ball out of play
10:14 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) fires the ball in from a mid-range free kick, but it blazes over the bar.
10:29 Event: Clearance by Atl.
10:30 Event: Foul by Atl.
10:39 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
11:36 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
11:45 Caption: Jackson Martinez (Atl. Madrid) receives a low pass just outside the box and drills a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. Fernando Muslera pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.
12:40 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
12:42 Event: Ball out of play
12:59 Caption: Excellent touch by Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray)! He latches on to a precise pass on the edge of the box and produces a shot goalwards which goes way wide of the left post.
13:16 Event: Clearance by Atl.
14:11 Event: Ball out of play
14:32 Caption: The manager has decided to make a substitution and Jackson Martinez walks off the pitch to be replaced by Fernando Torres (Atl. Madrid).
14:43 Event: Substitution by Atl.
14:59 Event: Throw-in by Atl.
15:31 Event: Ball out of play
15:33 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
15:44 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
15:51 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Galatasaray) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Szymon Marciniak no option but to blow his whistle.
15:56 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
16:20 Event: Foul by Atl.
16:57 Event: Substitution by Atl.
16:57 Caption: Here is a change. Luciano Vietto is going off and Diego Simeone gives the last tactical orders to Gabi (Atl. Madrid).
17:00 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
17:44 Event: Foul by Galatasaray

17:50 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
17:58 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
18:04 Event: Yellow card by Galatasaray
18:09 Caption: Gabi (Atl. Madrid) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Szymon Marciniak didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
18:17 Caption: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray) was quite harsh and Szymon Marciniak didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
18:23 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
18:41 Event: Foul by Atl.

20:41 Caption: Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) climbs high to connect with a cross near the penalty spot but plants a header well wide of the left post.

28:38 Caption: Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Jan Oblak.
29:42 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray

30:09 Caption: Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) receives an accurate pass and finds some space for a shot. The keeper is prepared and denies his low, long-range blast aimed directly at the bottom of the net.

36:59 Caption: Atl. Madrid keep the ball well and push forward with purpose, but here comes an interception from the opposition. The referee blows his whistle, Atl. Madrid are awarded a corner kick.
37:01 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
37:08 Event: Foul by Atl.
37:13 Caption: The corner from Koke (Atl. Madrid) is intercepted by the defence.
37:32 Event: Direct free-kick by Galatasaray
37:34 Caption: Koke (Atl. Madrid) commits a rough foul. Szymon Marciniak stops the game and makes a call. Galatasaray get a free kick.
37:35 Event: Ball out of play
37:48 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
37:51 Event: Ball out of play
37:56 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) takes the free kick and sends the ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready. Galatasaray force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
38:01 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
38:08 Event: Ball out of play
38:17 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) takes a short corner kick. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Galatasaray.
38:21 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
38:30 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
38:40 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atl.
38:43 Caption: The resulting corner from Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger. Galatasaray get a corner.
38:57 Caption: Sinan Gumus (Galatasaray) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
39:14 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
39:41 Caption: Szymon Marciniak blows for a foul after Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) was too aggressive in the battle for the ball. Atl. Madrid have a free kick from a promising distance.
39:47 Event: Direct free-kick by Atl.
39:52 Event: Ball out of play
39:54 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
39:58 Event: Ball out of play
39:59 Caption: Direct free kick. Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) attempts to beat the opposition's defence with a fine lofted pass into the penalty box, but one of the defenders reacts well and averts the threat.
40:07 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
40:52 Event: Shots on target by Atl.
41:24 Event: Ball out of play
41:29 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
41:34 Caption: Great touch by Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) as he receives a precise pass deep inside the box and rips a shot goalwards, but the keeper pulls off an amazing save!
42:27 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
42:28 Event: Ball out of play
42:39 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) blasts the ball from just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by the defender. Galatasaray force their opponents to concede a corner.
42:49 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
43:00 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.
43:47 Event: Ball out of play
43:56 Caption: Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray) finds himself in a promising position after receiving an excellent pass into the box, but one of the defenders produces a timely intervention to avert the threat.
44:13 Event: Clearance by Atl.
47:02 Caption: Oliver Torres (Atl. Madrid) was too fierce in his attempt to get the ball from his opponent and Szymon Marciniak blows for a foul.
47:28 Caption: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
47:59 Caption: We were witnesses to a rather ordinary game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. Neither of the teams could take the initiative and dominate today's game. The home team tried to prevail using combination football unlike the away players who attempted to beat the opposition's defence using mostly counter-attacks.
    

    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In an intense and action-packed encounter, Atletico Madrid triumphed over Galatasaray with a 2-0 victory, demonstrating both their defensive prowess and clinical finishing. From the opening whistle to the final blow, the match offered moments of thrilling excitement and breath-holding tension, capturing the essence of European football. 

The match kick-off was initiated by Atletico Madrid, who immediately pressed forward, looking to establish dominance early in the game. However, within the first minute, the aggressive play resulted in an early foul from the visitors. Despite the early setback, Galatasaray’s indirect free-kick did not yield any significant threat to Atletico’s defense. Shortly after, an early corner kick for Atletico Madrid almost brought the opening goal, but Galatasaray's defense managed to clear the danger swiftly.

As the minutes passed, both teams struggled to keep the ball in play, with multiple instances of the ball being put out of bounds and frequent throw-ins. This early part of the game was marked by a series of set-pieces and throw-ins, reflecting the high intensity and physical nature of the contest.

Atletico Madrid had their first significant chance at around the 8th minute, a shot from them went off target, demonstrating their intent to control the game early. They committed another foul soon after, giving Galatasaray an opportunity to regroup with an indirect free-kick. Around the 10th minute, Galatasaray had their first shots on target, a promising build-up involving Burak Yilmaz ended with a blocked effort, which was subsequently defended well by Atletico.

Atletico Madrid’s response came in the 14th minute when Luciano Vietto unleashed a fine strike from just outside the box, but Galatasaray’s Fernando Muslera pulled off a reflexive save to deny him. This was just a precursor to the drama that unfolded next. Around the 17th minute, Juanfran found Antoine Griezmann on the edge of the box, who unleashed a terrific shot into the bottom right corner, stunning the home crowd and putting Atletico ahead, 1-0.

Galatasaray, immediately after the restart, tried to put pressure on their opponents by pushing forward aggressively. However, Atletico remained composed, defending resolutely and waiting for counter-attacking opportunities. A few minutes later, another precise pass saw Saul latch onto it just near the box, but unfortunately for Atletico, his effort was way off target.

Galatasaray began to gain some momentum and enjoyed more possession as the half progressed, but Atletico’s efficient defending kept them at bay. A flurry of activity around the 22nd minute saw multiple free-kicks and corners for Galatasaray, with Wesley Sneijder’s deliveries causing some concern for the visiting defense, yet the hosts couldn't capitalize on these opportunities.

Shortly thereafter, Atletico Madrid doubled their lead in what can be described as a clinical piece of play. Around the 24th minute, a cross from Diego Godin found Antoine Griezmann, who again made no mistakes and poked the ball into the back of the net, bringing the score to 2-0. Galatasaray seemed rattled by the efficiency of Atletico's performance, struggling to make significant headway despite pushing numbers forward.

The Turkish team continued to assert pressure, particularly through Wesley Sneijder's efforts in the midfield, but their attempts were either saved by Jan Oblak or went wide of the target. Umut Bulut missed a great opportunity when his header concluded a good team move, only for it to go wide. The first half ended with the visitors firmly in control, having taken advantage of their chances while stifling Galatasaray’s attacks effectively.

The second half saw renewed vigor from the home side. A substitution by Galatasaray brought Yasin Oztekin into the game. Their intention was clear as they sought to inject some urgency and creativity into their play. Atletico Madrid, however, continued their disciplined approach, committing tactical fouls whenever necessary to break Galatasaray’s rhythm.

Despite several free-kicks and corner opportunities, Galatasaray found it challenging to break through the solid defensive setup of Atletico Madrid. Yasin’s dribble into space provided a slight glimmer of hope, but his resulting shot from the edge of the box was courageously blocked. Attempts from Lukas Podolski and Burak Yilmaz also failed to hit the target. Yilmaz's effort was remarkably saved by Oblak, who was proving to be a formidable barrier.

As fatigue began to set in, Atletico Madrid made strategic substitutions to conserve their energy and maintain their defensive shape. Galatasaray also used their substitutions to bring in some fresh legs, but despite the infusion of energy, they struggled to capitalize on the opportunities presented to them.

The intensity did not let up, but neither did Atletico’s organization and tactical discipline. An instance where Selcuk Inan connected with a pass and shot goalwards saw his attempt go wide, summing up the frustration for the Turkish side. This consistent defensive display from Atletico Madrid neutralized any threat posed by Galatasaray, encapsulating the effectiveness of their game plan.

Action continued at both ends with chances galore but executions lacking the precision required to alter the scoreline. Fernando Muslera was equally impressive, especially when he stretched to deny Jackson Martinez’s close-range effort. The constant back and forth made it an enthralling match, where the excitement never took a backseat.

In the final stages, Galatasaray threw everything forward in pursuit of a goal that might spark a comeback. However, their efforts were thwarted time and again by Atletico's resolute defense and Oblak’s goalkeeping heroics. A last-ditch header from Burak Yilmaz again found Oblak adequately prepared to make the save.

The final whistle from referee Szymon Marciniak brought an end to a fiercely contested match where Atletico Madrid’s clinical finishing and defensive masterclass ensured their deserved 2-0 victory over Galatasaray. Galatasaray had their moments and certainly played with ambition, but Atletico’s tactical nous and execution on the day made the difference.

Overall, this match was a testament to the strategic depth in football, showcasing how disciplined defending coupled with sharp counter-attacking can often triumph over relentless pressure. It demonstrated both the tenacity and tactical insight of Diego Simeone’s side, leaving Galatasaray to reflect on missed opportunities and the need for greater precision and composure in critical moments of the game.
